detail_desc: Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts, laser-cut edges and narrow, detachable shoulder straps. Metal fastener at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric. Slightly looser fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey, one with an all-over print.
Top in a viscose crêpe weave with short sleeves and a rounded hem.
Padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a zip down the front, welt side pockets and a zipped pocket on one sleeve. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Lined.
Belt in grained imitation leather with an adjustable, mini bucket bag with a drawstring closure at the top. Lined. The belt has a stud fastening. Size 4.5x12x14 cm. Width of belt 2 cm.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved lace body with a square neckline, high-cut back and lined gusset with press-studs. Lined at the bust.
Hair elastics in a crêpe weave.
V-neck body in lace and mesh with lined cups, narrow adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and press-studs at the crotch.

Straight-cut, knee-length dress in a lightweight, patterned weave with a small, frilled stand-up collar with a V-shaped opening at the front. Long sleeves with a decorative frill along the shoulder seams and narrow elastication at the cuffs with a frill trim. Unlined.

Ankle-length trousers in a slightly stretchy weave made from a viscose blend. Zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and a regular waist. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Elastic scrunchies in soft velour.
Long-sleeved blouse in a crinkled, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and a flounce at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a stand-up collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-cut shirt in a cotton weave in a relaxed fit with a turn-down collar, classic front, short sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.

Straight-cut coat in a woven wool blend in a relaxed fit with narrow notch lapels and buttons down the front. Flap front pockets, one inner pocket, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.

Short coat in soft, felted fabric with a shawl collar and a large, detachable faux fur collar. Concealed press-studs down the front, welt side pockets, a detachable tie belt at the waist, and a single back vent. Lined.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in organic cotton with a collar, button placket and press-studs at the crotch.
Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a narrow, detachable shoulder strap, flap with a magnetic fastener, and two inner compartments. Lined. Size 15x20 cm.
Biker jacket in imitation leather with a faux shearling lining. Notch lapels, a diagonal zip down the front and front pockets.
Short dress in a textured, cotton-blend weave with a V-neck, long sleeves with gathers on the shoulders and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Rounded hem with short slits in the sides.

Set with a long-sleeved cotton shirt, tie and a pair of suit trousers in a soft cotton weave. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Tie with an adjustable elastic strap and a fastener at the back. Trousers with adjustable elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and fake front pockets.
Hipster briefs in lace and microfibre with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a shaped neckline that has gathers at the top and is elasticated at the back. Long sleeves with elastication at the top and cuffs, a seam at the waist, a concealed zip in one side and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Hairband in braided imitation suede decorated with fabric flowers and butterflies. Elasticated at the back.
V-neck top in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Lace-covered trim at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and covered buttons at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in a fine-knit viscose blend with a round neck and decorative bow at the top. Ribbing around the neckline and hem.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
T-shirt in a soft slub cotton jersey and viscose blend with a deep V-neck at the front and seam centre back.
Short skirt in cotton twill with buttons down the front, a high waist and detachable belt with metal D-rings. Large flap patch pockets at the front. Unlined.
Long cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Wide, sturdy belt with a metal buckle that has a stud at the back. Width 3.4 cm.
Straight-style T-shirt in scuba fabric with a ribbed neckline.
Fine-knit top with a soft, brushed finish. Stand-up collar, dropped shoulders, long, ribbed sleeves and a straight-cut hem.
5-pocket shorts in supersoft, stretch denim with lightly worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button.

Parka in washed cotton twill with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and detachable hood with striped cotton poplin lining. Drawstring at the waist, handwarmer pockets, flap front pockets with a press-stud, elastication at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Straight-cut jacket in soft jersey with long notch lapels, welt front pockets and 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. No buttons. Unlined.
Heart-shaped sunglasses with narrow, rainbow-coloured frames and metal and plastic sidepieces. Adjustable nose pads and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, jersey-lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and elasticated cuffs. Jersey lining.
Biker jacket in imitation leather with a diagonal zip at the front, side pockets and ribbed jersey sections under the arms. Lined.
Suit trousers in twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and legs with creases.
Sandals in braided straw with straps over the foot and imitation leather insoles. Platform approx. 3 cm.
Lace shortie briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, low-cut legs and cutaway coverage at the back.

Fully lined shaping swimsuit that has a sculpting effect on the tummy, back and bum. Wrapover top, lightly padded cups, support panels, decorative gathers in the sides, and adjustable shoulder straps.
Long, off-the-shoulder dress in pleated chiffon with elastication and a double flounce at the top and a narrow elasticated seam at the waist. Lined.
Dungaree dress in cotton twill with an open chest pocket and flounce trimmed straps with adjustable buttoning at the front.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
Fine-knit ankle socks with elastication at the top.
Flared skirt in a double layer of tulle with lots of volume. Elasticated waist. Lined.
Swimsuit with an all-over shimmering foil print, two rows of flounces at the top and narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back. Lined at the front and crotch.
Sun hat in an airy cotton weave with a small embroidered detail on one side and ties under the chin. Lined.
Headband in thermal fleece. Width 8.5 cm.

Ankle-length trousers in a soft weave with a fake fly and regular waist with a decorative grosgrain bow at the front and elastication at the back. Diagonal side pockets and tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short, voluminous dress with a deep V-neck that has a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. 3/4-length puff sleeves with cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Fitted vest top in soft jersey.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Dressing gown in terry with a hood and zip down the front with a chin guard.
Short imitation suede skirt with a high paper bag waist.
5-pocket, slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details. High waist, zip fly and button, and super-skinny legs with cut-off, frayed hems.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
Double-knit jumper in soft yarn containing some wool with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Sports trousers in sturdy, fast-drying jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a leg pocket with a taped zip and panels in a contrasting colour. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a button placket, two chest pockets with decorative studs, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Sleeveless playsuit in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a raw-edge, flounced trim at the top and small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist and short legs.
Sleeveless sports bodysuit in fast-drying functional fabric with a low-cut neckline at the back and a high cut at the back.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Short elasticated plastic necklaces.
Soft, non-wired bra in mesh and satin with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Satin tie. Width 6.5 cm.
Double-layered tube scarf knitted in soft merino wool with a twisted detail at the front.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved bolero in fine-knit cotton with shimmering, reversible sequins on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins) and a button at the top.
Sunglasses with plastic and metal frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Knee-length dress in an airy linen and cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a seam and tie belt at the waist, and short slits in the sides. Unlined.

Set in soft cotton with a cardigan, T-shirt and trousers. Cardigan in patterned sweatshirt fabric with a soft brushed inside. Zip down the front with a chin guard, welt front pockets and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. T-shirt in soft jersey with a print motif on the front. Trousers in sweatshirt fabric with a soft brushed inside. Elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
